snippet: A representative from Honda Motor Co Ltd will testify before the U.S. Senate Commerce Committee at a Nov. 20 hearing over defective air bags manufactured by Japan's Takata Corp, a Honda spokesman said on Thursday....

headline.print_headline: Honda to Testify at U.S. Senate Hearing on Takata Air Bag Recalls
headline.main: Honda to Testify at U.S. Senate Hearing on Takata Air Bag Recalls

lead_paragraph: A representative from Honda Motor Co Ltd will testify before the U.S. Senate Commerce Committee at a Nov. 20 hearing over defective air bags manufactured by Japan's Takata Corp, a Honda spokesman said on Thursday.
